caption.center: CARL ROBINSON, APPELLANT, v. THE STATE OF FLORIDA, APPELLEE.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Dade County; Alan R. Schwartz, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Jesse J. McCrary, Jr., Mitchell M. Goldman, Miami, for appellant.
Robert L. Shevin, Atty. Gen., and Linda C. Hertz, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before BARKDULL, C.J., and HAVERFIELD and NATHAN, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Affirmed. Mackiewicz v. State, 114 So.2d 684 (Fla. 1959);Lynch v. State, 293 So.2d 44 (Fla. 1974); Spinkellink v.State, 313 So.2d 666 (Fla. 1975). Accord McCutchen v. State,96 So.2d 152 (Fla. 1957).
